org.openmuc.jdlms.client.hdlc.physical
Interface IPhysicalConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhysicalConnection
public interface IPhysicalConnection

Interface abstracting all access to and from the serial interface.

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the serial interface, freeing the resource for other programs
 boolean isClosed()
           
 void registerListener(IPhysicalConnectionListener listener)
          Registers an upper layer as Listener for incoming data
 void removeListener()
          Remove the actual listener from this serial interface

          Sends the given bytes over the serial interface

setSerialParams

void setSerialParams(int baud,
                     int databits,
                     int stopbits,
                     int parity)
                     throws gnu.io.UnsupportedCommOperationException
Changes the connection parameter of the serial interface

Parameters:
baud - Baud rate to communicate
databits - Number of Data bits (Range 7-8)
stopbits - Number of Stop bits (Range 0-2)
parity - Parity Bit (Range 0-2)
Throws:
gnu.io.UnsupportedCommOperationException
